metadata.title: USN-7157-1 -- PHP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain inputs when processed with convert.quoted-printable decode filters. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information or cause a crash. (CVE-2024-11233)  It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain HTTP requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to performing arbitrary HTTP requests originating from the server, thus potentially gaining access to resources not normally available to the external user. (CVE-2024-11234)  It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2024-11236, CVE-2024-8932)  It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain MySQL requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause the client to disclose the content of its heap containing data from other SQL requests and possible other data belonging to different users of the same server. (CVE-2024-8929)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7157-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-php7.4 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 libapache2-mod-php8.1 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 libphp8.1-embed - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-bcmath - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-bz2 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-cgi - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-cli - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-common - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-curl - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-dba - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-dev - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-enchant - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-fpm - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-gd - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-gmp - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-imap - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-interbase - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-intl - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-ldap - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-mbstring - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-mysql - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-odbc - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-opcache - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-pgsql - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-phpdbg - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-pspell - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-readline - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-snmp - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-soap - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-sqlite3 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-sybase - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-tidy - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-xml - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-xsl - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 php8.1-zip - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.20 No subscription required
